name: Dread Razor
text:
**Choose one —**
- Target a unit adjacent to you.
- If you are adjacent to an empty spawn point in the battle zone, target a unit in range.

name: Rusty Razor
text:
**Choose one —**
- Target a hero adjacent to you.
- If you are adjacent to an empty spawn point in the battle zone, target a hero in range.

name: Death Trap
text: An enemy hero in radius who is adjacent to an empty spawn point in the battle zone discards a card, if able.

name: Tide of Darkness
text: While you are performing an action, all spaces count as if they were in the battle zone and had a friendly minion spawn point.

name: Shield of Decay
text: +2 ::defense:: Defense if there are 2 or more empty spawn points in radius in the battle zone.

name: Littlefinger of Death
text:
**Choose one —**
- Target a unit adjacent to you.
- Target a hero in range who has one or more cards in the discard.

name: Dark Ritual
text: If there are 2 or more empty spawn points in radius in the battle zone, gain 1 coin.

name: Vampiric Shield
text: +2 ::defense:: Defense if there are 2 or more empty spawn points in radius in the battle zone.

name: Finger of Death
text:
**Choose one —**

name: Darker Ritual
text: If there are 2 or more empty spawn points in radius in the battle zone, gain 2 coins.

name: Weakness
text:
**This turn:** Enemy heroes in radius have -4 ::attack:: Attack.

name: Burning Skull
text:
Target a unit in range.
After the attack: Move up to 1 minion adjacent to you 1 space, to a space not adjacent to you.

name: Necromancy
text: Respawn a friendly minion in an empty friendly spawn point adjacent to you in the battle zone.

name: Aegis of Doom

name: Middlefinger of Death
text:
**Choose one, or both,** on different targets **—**

- Target a hero in range who has one or  more cards in the discard.

name: Darkest Ritual
text:
If there are 2 or more empty spawn points in radius in the battle zone, gain 2 coins.
If you have your Ultimate, gain an ::attack:: Attack item.
_(Use any spare card from the box with the corresponding icon.)_

name: Enfeeblement
text: **This turn:** Enemy heroes in radius have -6 ::attack:: Attack and cannot repeat actions.

name: Blazing Skull
text:
Target a unit in range.
